entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High zero.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 near noon then light this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 25 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then periods of snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1.
